meta.title: Villa Avantgarde | 4 Stars Villa in Mlini, Dubrovnik
meta.description: 4 stars Villa Avantgarde in Mlini near Dubrovnik with swimming pool and breakfast included. Peaceful location close to Dubrovnik Old Town. Book direct for best price guarantee.

home.intro: Villa Avantgarde is a 4 stars villa in Mlini, near Dubrovnik, offering elegant rooms and suites with breakfast included and a beautiful outdoor swimming pool. Ideal for couples and families seeking comfort, privacy and a peaceful location close to Dubrovnik.

accomodation.intro1: Villa Avantgarde offers stylish rooms and suites designed for comfort and relaxation, with breakfast included for all guests.
accomodation.intro2: Guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool, peaceful surroundings and easy access to Dubrovnik and nearby beaches in Mlini.

highlights.wifi: Free Wi-Fi in all rooms and suites
highlights.pool: Outdoor swimming pool with sun terrace
highlights.location: Peaceful location in Mlini near Dubrovnik

contact.intro: We’d love to welcome you to Villa Avantgarde. Please contact us directly for reservations, special offers or additional information.

meta.title: Villa Avantgarde Location | Mlini near Dubrovnik
meta.description: Villa Avantgarde is located in Mlini, a peaceful seaside village near Dubrovnik, close to beaches and only a short drive from Dubrovnik Old Town.
meta.ogDescription: Stay in Mlini near Dubrovnik in a 4 stars villa with swimming pool and breakfast included.

location.areaDescription: Mlini is a charming seaside village near Dubrovnik, known for its beautiful beaches, crystal-clear sea and peaceful atmosphere. It offers the perfect balance between relaxation and easy access to Dubrovnik Old Town.
